verbose_text: We speculate that IRF3 and/or the downstream IFN stimulated response element (ISRE), which mediates production of type I IFN in TLR3 signaling in mammals XREF_BIBR, may possibly be affected by Myd88, thus resulting in the enhanced antiviral effect observed in flounder administered with both poly (I : C) and Myd88 inhibitor.
evidence: ISRE), which mediates production of type I IFN
